DOC.brief_summary: The objective prove equivalence efficacy safety HD203 Enbrel® combination Methotrexate patient rheumatoid arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Double-blind Parallel Trial Evaluate Equivalence Efficacy Safety HD203 Enbrel RA Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective : To prove equivalence two group compare ACR20 W24 baseline inject HD203 25mg ( Enbrel® ) 25mg patient rheumatoid arthritis 24 week . Secondary Objective : To compare efficacy ACR20 , ACR50 ACR70 , etc along safety adverse event , vital sign , Laboratory test , physical examination immunogenicity , etc two group baseline inject HD203 25mg ( Enbrel® ) 25mg patient rheumatoid arthritis 48 week .
